options.name: Dusk Forged
options.description:
The bearer must reroll its failed Armour Saves.
The bearer automatically fails all Special Saves,
regardless of whether Using the Shield or not.

options.name: Sigil of Protection
options.description: +1 Arm.

options.name: Wild Warding
options.description:
+3 Arm.
The models Armour value can never be improved beyond 5.

options.name: Death Cheater
options.description: +1 Arm, and Regeneration (4+).

options.name: Ghostly Guard
options.description: +2 Arm against non-Magical Attacks.

options.name: Destiny's Call
options.description:
Aegis(4+), and the model’s Armour is always 3.
Note that this means it cannot be improved beyond 3.
It is still affected by Armour Penetration.

options.name: Warding of Unity
options.description:
Attached, which cannot be lost, and
Resistance (Melee Attacks).

options.name: Basalt Infusion
options.description: +1 Armour, Aegis (3+, against Flaming Attacks), and the wearer automatically fails all Regeneration Saves.

options.name: Stalker's Standard
options.description: The bearer’s unit gains Strider.

options.name: Sheltering Standard
options.description:
Attacks with Armour Penetration 3 or less can never
reduce the Armour Save roll of the bearer’s unit to worse than 6+.

options.name: Flaming Standard
options.description:
One use only. Duration: End of Combat.
May be activated when Choosing Equipment and Abilities.
The bearer’s unit gains Flaming Attacks

options.name: Aether Icon
options.description: The bearer’s unit gains Magic Resistance (1).

options.name: Banner of Courage
options.description:
The bearer’s unit may reroll failed Panic Tests.
If the Battle Standard Bearer or the General is part of the bearer’s unit, it automatically passes Panic Tests instead.

options.name: Banner of Speed
options.description: A unit containing a Banner of Speed gains +1" Charge Speed and Mobility.

options.name: Distortion Emblem
options.description:
One use only. Duration: End of Turn.
May be activated at the start of any Phase.
The bearer’s unit gains Hard Target (2)

options.name: Rending Banner
options.description:
One use only. Duration: End of Combat.
May be activated when Choosing Equipment and Abilities:
Rank-and-File models in the bearer’s unit gain +1 AP.

options.name: Vorpal Binding
options.description:
Successful Armour Saves, Regeneration Saves and Aegis Saves against
attacks made with Vorpal Binding must be rerolled.

options.name: King Slayer
options.description:
Attached, which cannot be lost.
While there is an enemy Character in contact with the wielder’s unit, the wielder gains +1 Att, +2 Str, and +2 AP.

options.name: Touch of Greatness
options.description: +1 Str, +1 AP.

options.name: Giant Slayer
options.description:
Crush Attack.
This Crush Attack gains +1 to hit towards models with Height 5.

options.name: Supernatural Dexterity
options.description: +3 Def and +3 Off.

options.name: Eldritch Inscriptions
options.description: First Strike (Hatred and Zeal).

options.name: Shield Breaker
options.description: +6 AP.

options.name: Hero's Heart
options.description: +1 Att, and always at least Str 5 and AP 2.

options.name: Magical Heirloom
options.description: The bearer knows the Hereditary Spell of its Army Book in addition to its other spells (it cannot select it during Spell Selection, and cannot replace or otherwise lose it).

options.name: Talisman of Shielding
options.description: Aegis (5+).

options.name: Crown of the Wizard King
options.description:
During Pre-game Selections, randomise a Magic Path (from all ten Paths in this book).
The wearer is a Wizard Apprentice using the
randomised Path, and may not Swap any spells.
The bearer cannot take any Magic Items nor any other upgrades that are restricted to Wizards (or any types of Wizards).

options.name: Mimic Cloak
options.description:
Stand Behind.
The wearer’s model loses Stubborn, Bodyguard, cannot gain either in any way, and is never considered to fulfil the criteria of Bodyguard.
In addition, the model cannot make any Supporting Attacks.

options.name: Talisman of the Void
options.description:
Channel (1).
This item can only be used if the model’s army´s total combined Channel is 2 or less (excluding Channel from this Magic Item).

options.name: Scroll of a Free Mind
options.description:
One use only. Duration: Permanent
Can be activated in a friendly Magic Phase before drawing a Flux card the bearer loses all its learned spells from its selected path granted by Wizard Apprentice, Wizard Adept or Wizard Master. Hereditary and Spells granted by other sources are unaffected.

The bearer gains the same number of spells from a single other path available to the bearer during list creation.
The spells are gained starting from the first spell of the path and towards the last spell of the path.
This does not change the bearer’s Path Selection.

Note: This means a single Wizard can gain the same spell twice, yet still not cast the same spell multiple times.
Example: a Vampire Wizard Adept with Gates of the Netherworld that selected #1, and #3 from Occultism and swapped to Arise! during List Creation selects Evocation with Scroll of the Free Mind, now knows Whispers of the Veil twice. Danse Macabre, and Arise!.

options.name: Mask of Mindless Violence
options.description:
Rage.
All Melee Attacks made by or against the wearer gain +1 to hit.

options.name: Obsidian Rock
options.description: Magic Resistance (2).

options.name: Rod of Battle
options.description:
The bearer can cast a unique Bound Spell:
Rod of Battle: Casting Value (4+)
Type: Range 18", Augment. Duration: One Turn.
Effect:
The target’s Standard Melee Attacks gain +1 to hit.

options.name: Binding Scroll
options.description:
One use only. Duration: One Phase
Can be activated during the opponent’s Siphon the Veil (Magic Phase, step 2).
When activated, choose a Caster and select one of their spells (Bound or Learned): the chosen Caster cannot voluntarily cast the selected instance of this spell.
E.g. if a caster has the same spell more than one time, only a single instance cannot be cast, and this has no effect on Magical Mishap

options.name: Potion of Power Preservation
options.description:
One use only. Duration: Instant.
May be used immediately when a Casting Roll or Dispel Roll fails, due to not rolling high enough: do not discard the Magic Dice used in this unsuccessful attempt.

options.name: Dragon's Brew
options.description:
One use only. Duration: End of Turn
Breath Attack(Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks, Stand and Shoot).

options.name: Potion of Swiftness
options.description:
One use only. Duration: Round of Combat.
+3 Agi.

options.name: Scroll of Draining
options.description:
One use only. Duration: Instant.
May be activated in the opponent’s Magic Phase, immediately after Excess Magic: the opponent immediately discards 1 Magic Dice.

options.name: Potion of Healing
options.description:
One use only. Duration: Instant.
The bearer’s model Recovers 1 HP.

options.name: Scroll of Power
options.description:
One use only. Duration: Instant.
May be used immediately after a Casting Roll: the bearer may add one additional free Magic Dice to this Casting Roll (the limit of 5 Magic Dice still applies).

options.name: Spell Scroll
options.description:
One use only. Duration: One Phase

May be activated at any time during your Magic Phase. The bearer knows the spell indicated in brackets (X) in addition to its other spells,
(if the bearer already knows the spell, this has no effect).
